item.title: Lucid - Intrepid x Viii {Dubstep, D&B, Electronic}
item.dc:creator: Little_Baby
item.description:
Intro is nice and clean.

Mini-drop at 0:40 is unexpected, but good and not too hard; keeps the build up in its place.

Build up is great and also clean.

Drop is a little too bassy, I thought this would be a chill and more ambient style song by the intro and build if there were no tags. Turning tone down, just a tiny bit would work.

Rest of the song is great 7/10 would listen again.

.+ Follow
.+ Like

Read full topic
